# se-link


<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                                                                                                                                           | Type                       | Default      |
| ---------- | ---------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------- | ------------ |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | Determines whether or not the link is disabled.                                                                                                                       | `boolean`                  | `undefined`  |
| `link`     | `link`     | Defines the text to be displayed in your link.                                                                                                                        | `string`                   | `undefined`  |
| `type`     | `type`     | Set to `internal` (default setting) if the url is within your application. Set to `external` if the url is outside your application, adding an underline to the link. | `"external" \| "internal"` | `'internal'` |
| `url`      | `url`      | Defines the url the user should get redirected to when clicking on the link.                                                                                          | `string`                   | `undefined`  |
